title: Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        Permits are required for:    Special Events such as recreational activities, musical performances and celebrations; Demonstrations such as speeches, picketing, vigils and other activities designed to communicate a message; Special Uses including any sport activities, weddings, and ceremonies; and Commercial Filming and Photography   For application and details, visit National Mall and Memorial Parks Permits & Reservations.
